name: Men’s Lacoste SPORT Mesh Panels Sweatshirt
description: A new ally for sports performance, this crew neck sweatshirt is crafted in stretchy cotton blend interlock. Adorned with breathable mesh panels on the shoulders and back, it features ribbed tone-on-tone finishes and a green crocodile appliqué on the chest. You can count on the simple elegance of this piece any day.

name: Men's Lacoste Holiday Comic Badge Striped V-Neck Sweater
description: Men's Lacoste Holiday Comic Badge Striped V-Neck Sweater.

name: Men's Lacoste Striped Organic Cotton Jersey Sweater
description: Men's Lacoste Holiday Comic Badge Striped V-Neck Sweater.

name: Men's T-Clip Tricolour Leather and Suede Trainers
description: A heritage court trainer is updated for the season with a tennis-inspired sideline silhouette and authentic 80s detailing. Premium uppers are presented in softer, hand-feel nappa leather and feature an attractive, pigmented finish. Suede hits team with the embroidered green crocodile on the quarter to enhance the sport-luxe mood. Debossed branding on the heel rounds off this key Lacoste style.

name: Men's Lacoste T-Clip Leather Colour Contrast Trainers
description: A stylish leather silhouette with flashes of colour to add flair to your step.

name: Men's Lacoste T-Clip Leather Premium Trainers
description: Amp up your look with the T-Clip; A fusion of 80s vibes and modernised accents. Step up your game.
